member.name: DISPLAYCONFIG_SOURCE_MODE
member.summary: The DISPLAYCONFIG_SOURCE_MODE structure represents a point or an offset in a two-dimensional space.

member.name: DISPLAYCONFIG_SOURCE_MODE.width
member.summary: The width in pixels of the source mode.

member.name: DISPLAYCONFIG_SOURCE_MODE.height
member.summary: The height in pixels of the source mode.

member.name: DISPLAYCONFIG_SOURCE_MODE.pixelFormat
member.summary: A value from the enumeration that specifies the pixel format of the source mode.

member.name: DISPLAYCONFIG_SOURCE_MODE.position
member.summary: A structure that specifies the position in the desktop coordinate space of the upper-left corner of this source surface. The source surface that is located at (0, 0) is always the primary source surface.
